message: Take it or leave it, Bob! 1 cent for you, the rest for me.
Let's split it down the middle, Alice!
Take it or leave it, Bob! You're getting a better deal than before, but I'm not giving up much.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Alice, but I'm not going to give up too much yet!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm taking a bigger share, but I'm still leaving you with something.

This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not getting any younger.
I'm not going to give in that easily, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
This is my last chance to get a good deal, Bob. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to give up yet, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll take whatever I can get at this point, Bob. Please accept this offer.
I'm not going to give in now, Alice. I'll take the risk of getting nothing rather than accepting this terrible offer.
